title: EVERYONE PANIC!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: GANGPLANK IS DEAD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! HOW WILL WE PLAY THE NEW GAMEMODE OR ENJOY ACT THREE WITHOUT HIM??!?!!?!!!?!??!?!!?!!!?!?

replies.body: Act 3 came out along with Black Market Brawlers. Its part of the bligewater event.
And how are we supposed to enjoy this without Gangplank?
I BLAME OBAMA.  Or Lucian, whichever game you want to reference <3
